title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonicsb. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for superclass), so could be done. At least isValidTypeNamef. label could say 'Select destination type:'g.
OB: The dialog for moving static members lacks mnemonics.
EB: The dialog for moving static members should include mnemonics for improved accessibility.
SR: When browsing offers for my type from a CU in a different project, there should be proper validation on the type field. Additionally, the label in the dialog should be changed to 'Select destination type:' for clarity.
